MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: checks all shows at the same time, made the windows of ted look better, some memory fixes, growl support for mac, firefox support for linux, and lots of bugfixes.

English.Char_Desc_80: Torrent Episode Downloader (ted) downloads torrents from your favourite tv shows
English.Char_Desc_250: Ted (torrent episode downloader) will check for new episodes of your favourite tv shows. Ted will download the torrent if he finds a new episode and will open it in your favorite bittorrent client.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Meet ted! Your new way of downloading tv shows from the web! Add your favourite tv shows to ted and ted will automatically download torrents of new episodes!
Ted has built in support to download torrents for the newest episodes from 24, Lost, The Simpsons, South Park and many more!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Meet ted! Your new way of downloading tv shows from the web! Add your favourite tv shows to ted and ted will automatically download torrents of new episodes!
Ted has built in support to download torrents for the newest episodes from 24, Lost, The Simpsons, South Park and many more!
Features: * Checks feeds from TorrentReactor, Mininova, TVRSS, The PirateBay, Mr. Twig and Isohunt for new episodes of tv shows * Fill in the current season and episode you are watching. Ted will automatically find new episodes that you have not seen yet * filter on filesize and on amount of seeders * Built-in support for all mainstream shows (24, Lost, Topgear, Desperate Housewives, the Simpsons, South Park, Grey's Anatomy, Battlestar Galactica, etc.) * Add your own shows to Ted * Use keywords to filter out fakes and unwanted versions of episodes * Use episode- and breakschedulers to save your resources and bandwidth from the torrentsites * Saves torrents of new shows to your harddisk and optionally opens the torrents in your favourite torrent client
